community_topResults: Showing top 50 results. Try more specific keywords for better matches.

communityDetail_noContent: No content available for this newsletter.

disconnect_reconnectNote: You can reconnect Gmail at any time to scan and import again.

emlDrop_dropDescription: Supports single or multiple file import
emlDrop_fileTypeHint: Only .eml files are supported. Export newsletters from your email client as .eml format.
emlPreview_description: Review the newsletter details before importing
emptyState_browseNewsletters: Browse newsletters shared by the community
emptyState_clickToCopy: Click to copy your email address

emptyState_discoverDescription: Discover newsletters shared by the community or subscribe to your favorites
emptyState_forwardingTip: You can also forward existing newsletters from your personal inbox to this address.

gmailConnect_errorCancelled: You cancelled the connection. Click Connect to try again.

import_description: Connect your email accounts to import existing newsletters and discover new ones.
import_gmailErrorDesc: Something went wrong loading the Gmail connection
import_scannerErrorDesc: Something went wrong with the newsletter scanner
importDialog_description: Choose how you'd like to import your newsletters
importDialog_forwardDescription: Forward newsletters from your existing inbox to your dedicated address
importDialog_forwardingAppleStep3: Set condition: "From" contains the newsletter sender
importDialog_forwardingAppleStep4: Set action: "Forward Message" to your Hushletter address
importDialog_forwardingGmailStep1: Go to Settings → Filters and Blocked Addresses
importDialog_forwardingGmailStep3: In the "From" field, enter the newsletter sender's email
importDialog_forwardingGmailStep4: Click "Create filter", check "Forward it to" and select your Hushletter address
importDialog_forwardingInstruction: Set up a filter to automatically forward newsletter emails to this address. Each forwarded email will appear in your collection within seconds.
importDialog_forwardingManualTip: You can also forward any individual email manually — just forward it to the address above.
importDialog_forwardingOutlookStep3: Set condition: "From" contains the newsletter sender
importDialog_forwardingOutlookStep4: Set action: "Forward to" your Hushletter address
importDialog_gmailDescription: Scan your Gmail inbox to discover and import newsletters automatically
importDialog_gmailExplanation: Connect your Gmail account to automatically find newsletters in your inbox. We'll scan for newsletter senders and let you choose which ones to import.
importDialog_gmailPrivacyNote: Read-only access. Your email content stays private.
importDialog_uploadDescription: Drag and drop .eml files exported from your email client
importManual_appleMailSteps: Select email → File → Save As → Format: Raw Message Source
importManual_description: Import newsletters from .eml files exported from your email client
importManual_gmailSteps: Open email → Three dots menu → Download message
importManual_outlookSteps: Select email → File → Save As → Save as type: Outlook Message Format
importProgress_importingNote: This may take a few moments depending on your email history
importProgress_queuedDesc: Your import is queued and will start shortly
landing_ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of readers who have simplified their newsletter experience.
landing_ctaTitle: Ready to take control of your newsletters?
landing_featureAiDesc: Get quick AI-generated summaries of your newsletters when you're short on time.
landing_featureCommunityDesc: Discover and access newsletters from our community's shared collection.
landing_featureEmailDesc: Get a unique email address just for your newsletters. No more cluttered inbox.
landing_featureRealtimeDesc: Newsletters arrive instantly and are automatically organized by sender.
landing_featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage your newsletters
landing_subtitle: One dedicated email address. All your newsletters in one clean interface.
mergeFolderConfirmation: All newsletters and senders from "{source}" will be moved to "{target}". This action can be undone within 30 seconds.
mergeFolderDescription: Move all newsletters and senders from "{source}" into another folder. The "{source}" folder will be deleted.

mergeFolderDlg_description: Move all newsletters and senders from "{sourceFolderName}" into another folder. The "{sourceFolderName}" folder will be deleted.
mergeFolderDlg_errorSelfMerge: Cannot merge a folder into itself
mergeFolderDlg_errorSourceNotFound: Source folder no longer exists - it may have been deleted
mergeFolderDlg_errorTargetNotFound: Target folder no longer exists - it may have been deleted
mergeFolderDlg_noTargetsAvailable: No other folders available to merge into

mergeFolderErrorSelf: Cannot merge a folder into itself

mergeFolderErrorTargetNotFound: Target folder no longer exists - it may have been deleted
mergeFolderNoTargets: No other folders available to merge into

modNewsletter_errorRejectReasonRequired: Please provide a reason for rejection
modNewsletter_noPiiMessage: Content appears clean for community publishing.
modNewsletter_rejectDialogMessage: This newsletter will be removed from the moderation queue. The user's copy will remain unchanged.
modNewsletter_successLinkedExisting: Newsletter linked to existing community content
onboarding_welcomeSubtitle: Let's get you set up in just a minute
onboarding_featureReceiveDescription: Get a personal email address to subscribe to any newsletter. They'll all arrive in one place.
onboarding_featureOrganizeDescription: Newsletters are automatically organized into folders by sender. Find anything instantly.
onboarding_featureDiscoverDescription: Browse newsletters shared by the community and add your favorites to your collection.
onboarding_chooseEmailDescription: Pick a memorable prefix for your newsletter email. This is the address you'll use to subscribe to newsletters.
onboarding_prefixInvalid: Use 3-20 characters: lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
onboarding_upgradeDescription: Upgrade to Pro to choose a memorable prefix like your-name@hushletter.com
onboarding_syncRetry: Still activating. Try again in a moment.
onboarding_syncError: Could not verify subscription status. Please try again.
onboarding_customPrefixDescription: Pick a memorable prefix for your newsletter email. Your original address will keep working too.
newsletters_aiSummaryUnavailable: AI summary feature is temporarily unavailable.
newsletters_deleteNewsletterDesc: This will permanently delete this newsletter. This action cannot be undone.
newsletters_noStarredDesc: Star newsletters you want to find again quickly.
newsletters_noHiddenDesc: Newsletters you hide will appear here.
newsletters_privateTooltip: This newsletter is in your private collection
newsletters_removeFromCollectionDesc: This will remove the newsletter from your personal collection. You can re-add it from the community library.
archive_emptyStateDesc: Newsletters and folders you archive will appear here.
bin_emptyStateDesc: Newsletters you delete will be moved here.
bin_emptyConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all newsletters currently in Bin. This action cannot be undone.
newsletterSearch_instructionMessage: Enter search criteria and click Search to find newsletters
newsletterSearch_noResults: No newsletters found matching your criteria
onboarding_controlDescription: You can mark specific senders as private anytime. Private newsletters are never shared and only you can see them.
onboarding_description: Your newsletters help build a shared library for everyone.
onboarding_privacyNote: Your identity is never revealed. Community members can see newsletter content but not who contributed it.
onboarding_sharedDescription: Newsletters you receive are shared with the community, helping everyone discover great content from publishers they might not know about.
privacyAudit_passMessage: All privacy checks passed. Private content is properly isolated from community database.
privacySender_noSendersMessage: No senders have been marked private by any user
reader_contentUnavailable: Content is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
reader_noContent: This newsletter has no content available.
reader_emptyPane_subtitle: Pick a newsletter from the sidebar or start with one of these
reader_emptyPane_quickTip: Tip: Use arrow keys to navigate between newsletters
reader_emptyPane_allCaughtUpDesc: You've read everything. New newsletters will appear here.

renameFolderNameTooLong: Folder name must be 100 characters or less

senderScanner_noNewslettersNote: This could happen if you don't have newsletters in your inbox, or if they don't have standard newsletter headers. You can try scanning again or use your dedicated email address to subscribe to newsletters.
senderScanner_reviewNote: Review the detected senders and select which ones to import.
senderScanner_scanningNote: This may take a few moments depending on your inbox size
senderScanner_scanNote: We'll look for emails with newsletter characteristics like unsubscribe links, known newsletter platforms, and mailing list headers.

sharingOnboarding_privacyNote: Your identity is never revealed. Community members can see newsletter content but not who contributed it.

summaryPanel_failedToGenerateTryAgain: Failed to generate summary. Please try again.

trendChart_notEnoughData: Not enough data for trend analysis (need at least 2 data points)
welcome_greeting: Welcome to your new newsletter reader!
welcome_howItWorks_1: Subscribe to newsletters using your dedicated email address below
welcome_howItWorks_2: New newsletters arrive automatically and are organized by sender
welcome_howItWorks_3: Read, star, and organize in a clean, distraction-free reader
welcome_howItWorks_4: Already have newsletters elsewhere? Import them below
welcome_intro: Hushletter is your private inbox for newsletters. Here's how it works:
landing_heroSubtitle: Get a dedicated email just for newsletters. Every sender gets its own folder — organized, clean, and always yours.
landing_featuresSubtitle: A thoughtfully designed inbox for your newsletters
landing_featureUnifiedDesc: All your newsletters in one beautiful place. No more hunting through your main inbox.
landing_featureSmartFoldersDesc: Every sender gets its own folder. Merge them to create custom collections.
landing_featureAiDesc: Get the gist without reading everything
landing_featureInsightsDesc: Track your reading habits and favorites
landing_featureCommunityDesc: Discover what newsletters your friends are reading
landing_featureDiscoveryDesc: Find and subscribe to amazing newsletters curated by topic
landing_step2Desc: Use it on any newsletter platform
landing_testimonial1Quote: Finally, my main inbox is clean! I can actually focus on work emails now. Hushletter is a game-changer.
landing_testimonial2Quote: I subscribe to 30+ newsletters. This is the ONLY way to keep them organized. Love the auto-folders!
landing_testimonial3Quote: Such a simple idea, so perfectly executed. I actually read my newsletters now instead of letting them pile up.
landing_pricingSubtitle: Free stays usable. Pro unlocks AI + Gmail + custom address.
landing_pricingFreeDesc: Great for getting organized — with a hard upgrade wall once you hit the cap.
landing_pricingStorageLimit2: After {count}: new arrivals are stored but locked (Pro-only)
landing_pricingStorageLimit3: Hard cap at {count} stored (new arrivals stop storing)
landing_pricingProDesc: Designed to cover AI + email infrastructure while keeping Free delightful.
landing_pricingProFeat3: Vanity email alias (keep your original address too)
landing_pricingCheckoutError: Unable to start checkout. Please try again.
landing_ctaTitle: Ready to fall in love with newsletters again?
landing_ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of readers who've reclaimed their inbox and rediscovered the joy of newsletters.
